description:
Socket an Artifact's [slot_trait] Trait Slot with this item to gain this trait:\n\nPotion Time!:
At the end of your other creatures' turns, this creature has a 10% chance to {ACTION_cast} [icons,1968]Concoction. After this creature {ACTION_attacks}, it has a 25% chance to {ACTION_cast} [icons,1968]Concoction.
name: Mystery Vial
